TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WorkflowInstanceState extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Aborted = int32(3)

remarks.format: ## Remarks The workflow instance will be in this state after <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Abort%2A> has been called. A workflow in this state is capable of being resumed using <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Run%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Complete = int32(2)

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow in this state has exited, and its <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> or <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.InvokeCompleted> event has executed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Idle = int32(0)

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow in this state is waiting on an incoming event, such as when executing a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Pick> activity, or is waiting for the expiration of a timeout, such as when executing a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Delay> activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Runnable = int32(1)

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow in this state has been created, but <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Run%2A> has not been called.
